top_comments.comment: It’s always the same story. The rich countries are always at fault 🙄 I agree that industrial countries are responsible in part for this world tragedy, but let’s not forget the damage the poorer countries do. Desertification is occurring all over Africa, India…because those societies are reproducing themselves like rabbits. It’s still common for males to have multiple wives. In those places they cut down trees for fuel, overfishing their rivers and lakes, competing with wildlife for habitat…My point is if the responsibility is not equal shared, we are doomed. The rich and the poor.✌️
